citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm on
3/25/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking at the door and calling. After no answer
left a voicemail. Waited 30 minutes before contacting again and leaving a second voicemail. Failure to provide access to
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may
result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
REBECCA NANNEY, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm on 
3/25/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking at the door and calling. After no answer 
left a voicemail. Waited 30 minutes before contacting again and leaving a second voicemail. Failure to provide access to 
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may 
result in enforcement action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
REBECCA NANNEY, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
